definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. choose a general from among the dwarfs/fig. choose the best person available (out of a mediocre bunch)
pinyin: ai3 zi5 li5 ba2 jiang1 jun1

sentences.english: The dwarf put his hand to his great flapped ear, and counterfeited the closest attention.
sentences.chinese: 矮子用手張起他那大邊的耳朵，裝出密切注意的樣子。

sentences.english: I am a giant of speech and manikin of behavior.
sentences.chinese: 我是言語的巨人，行動的矮子。

sentences.english: He looked around and spotted Garfield the Dwarf.
sentences.chinese: 他四下看了看，認出了矮子加菲爾德。

sentences.english: The Lieutenant - Colonel Miranda was a short, gray-faced man, who had been in the army all his life .
sentences.chinese: 米蘭達中校是個臉色灰白的矮子，一生都在軍界。

sentences.english: A dwarf going upstairs getting higher step by step.
Slim looked at Jack. "And what do you want, Shorty ?"
sentences.chinese: 桑姆看着傑克，“你怎麼想呢，小矮子？”

sentences.english: Will my sociall status borever be marked by my shortness?
sentences.chinese: 我的社會地位將永遠被標着一個“矮子”的記號嗎？

sentences.english: He looked upwards, and saw that the dwarf was smoking in his hammock.
sentences.chinese: 他擡頭向上一望，看到矮子正在吊牀裏噴雲吐霧。

sentences.english: Elizabeth has eleven elves in her elm tree.
sentences.chinese: 伊麗莎白有十一矮子在她的榆木樹。

sentences.english: One is a giant, the other a dwarf.
sentences.chinese: 一個是巨人，而另一個卻是矮子。

sentences.english: I have loved you since as long as I can remember, Shortie.
sentences.chinese: 我愛你，因爲只要我能記住，矮子。

sentences.english: Hey shortie , did not have your milk this morning?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，小矮子，今天早上又沒喝牛奶對嗎？

definition: a person of short stature/a short person
stupid great hulk of a man
rice tub (from which cooked rice or other food is served)/(fig.) fathead/a good-for-nothing
back of a tiger and waist of a bear/tough and stocky build
